roleset.name: disconfirm, be not positive for

example.name: both args
example.text: Exam is otherwise negative for pathology.

example.name: one more with both
example.text: Single left renal artery is negative for significant stenosis.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN class. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Blood type
example.note: *NOTE* For blood types, the letter type is not the arg2 of "negative". Please use ADJ.

roleset.name: a bad attitude

example.name: Both args
example.text: He is negative in his outlook on life.

example.name: Arg 1 only - this is different than negative.01 because it means a 'bad evaluation' rather than one that finds nothing.
example.text: She was given a negative evaluation at work.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN class. FN class attitude_description. Framed by Katie.
